sampleMeetups.title: Seoul Digital Nomad Monthly Meetup
sampleMeetups.description:
Join us for our monthly Seoul digital nomad meetup! This is a great opportunity to network, share experiences, and make new friends in the nomad community.

## What to Expect
- Casual networking session
- Short presentations from community members
- Q&A about living and working in Seoul
- Optional dinner afterwards at a nearby restaurant

## Location
We'll be meeting at Spark Labs coworking space in Gangnam. Easy access via Gangnam Station (Line 2, Exit 11).

## Agenda
- 6:00 PM: Arrival and introductions
- 6:30 PM: Short presentations
- 7:00 PM: Networking and discussion
- 8:00 PM: Dinner (optional)

Whether you're new to Seoul or a long-term resident, all are welcome! Come with questions, stories, and an open mind.

sampleMeetups.title: Bangkok Coworking Crawl
sampleMeetups.description:
Explore the best coworking spaces in Bangkok with fellow nomads! We'll visit 3 different spaces across the city, checking out their facilities, amenities, and community vibes.

## Schedule
- 9:00 AM: Meet at Coffee Hero, Thong Lor
- 10:30 AM: Visit The Hive Thong Lor
- 12:00 PM: Lunch break
- 1:30 PM: Check out JustCo, Srinakarin
- 3:00 PM: Final stop at Launchpad, Asoke
- 4:00 PM: Drinks and debrief

## What's Included
- Tours of each coworking space
- Day pass trials (where available)
- Special discounts for monthly memberships
- Community insights and tips

Great for anyone new to Bangkok or looking to switch up their workspace!

Note: Participants will cover their own transportation and food costs.
sampleMeetups.location: Starting at Coffee Hero, Thong Lor

sampleMeetups.title: Lisbon Nomad Coffee Chats
sampleMeetups.description:
Casual coffee meetup for digital nomads in Lisbon! No agenda, no presentations - just good coffee and great conversations.

## What
Bring your questions, stories, and ideas. Topics often include:
- Best neighborhoods to live
- Visa and residency tips
- Coworking space recommendations
- Things to do on weekends
- Local food and culture

## Where
We'll meet at The Mill, a fantastic specialty coffee roaster in Príncipe Real. They have excellent coffee, plenty of seating, and a relaxed atmosphere perfect for conversation.

Look for the Konomads sign on our table!

Note: This is a weekly recurring meetup. Feel free to come to one or all of them!

sampleMeetups.title: Seoul Tech Startup Networking Night
sampleMeetups.description:
Connect with Seoul's vibrant startup community! This event brings together entrepreneurs, developers, designers, and investors interested in the Korean startup ecosystem.

## Highlights
- Pitch session: 3 local startups will present their ideas
- Panel discussion: Building tech products in Korea
- Networking: Meet potential co-founders, partners, or investors
- Free drinks and appetizers

## Who Should Attend
- Startup founders and employees
- Remote workers interested in the startup scene
- Developers looking for startup opportunities
- Investors scouting for promising startups

## Venue
Thanks to our sponsor, we're hosting at Station 3 in Gangnam. Great venue with plenty of space for mingling.

RSVP required by February 10th for security clearance.

sampleMeetups.title: Thai Language Exchange Circle
sampleMeetups.description:
Improve your Thai language skills while helping others practice English! This language exchange meetup is perfect for nomads who want to connect more deeply with local culture.

## Format
- Small groups of 4-6 people
- Mixed Thai and English speakers
- Structured conversation topics
- Casual, supportive environment

## Schedule
- 2:00 PM: Arrive and get into groups
- 2:15 PM: Warm-up conversations
- 2:45 PM: Topic-based discussions
- 3:30 PM: Break and regroup
- 3:45 PM: More conversations
- 4:30 PM: Wrap up and optional dinner

## Level
All levels welcome! We'll match groups based on proficiency. Whether you're just starting with sawasdee or having full conversations, there's a place for you.

## Location
Chulalongkorn University area - exact location will be shared with confirmed attendees.

Free to attend. Donations welcome to cover room rental.

sampleMeetups.title: Lisbon Weekend Hiking Group
sampleMeetups.description:
Explore the beautiful nature around Lisbon with fellow nomads! We organize weekend hikes for all fitness levels.

## This Week's Hike
**Sintra to Cabo da Roca**
- Distance: 12km
- Difficulty: Moderate
- Duration: 4-5 hours

## Highlights
- Pena Palace and Quinta da Regaleira views
- Moorish Castle ruins
- Atlantic coast scenery
- Westernmost point of Europe!

## Logistics
- Meet at Rossio Station at 8:00 AM
- Take train to Sintra together
- Expected return: 3:00 PM
- Bring: water, snacks, good walking shoes, layers

## Cost
Train ticket (~€5 return) + any food/drinks

## Weather Policy
Light rain: We go! Heavy rain: Rescheduled to next weekend.

Limited to 15 people to keep group manageable. Sign up early!

sampleMeetups.title: Konomads Virtual Community Town Hall
sampleMeetups.description:
Join us for our quarterly virtual town hall! This is your chance to:

- Meet the Konomads team
- Learn about new features and updates
- Share feedback and suggestions
- Ask questions about the platform
- Connect with the broader community

## Agenda
1. Welcome and community highlights (15 min)
2. Platform updates and roadmap (20 min)
3. Community feedback session (30 min)
4. Q&A with the team (25 min)
5. Closing and next steps (10 min)

## What We'll Cover
- New features coming to Konomads
- Community growth and metrics
- Safety and moderation improvements
- How to get more involved

## How to Join
Zoom link will be shared with registered participants 24 hours before the event.

Open to all Konomads members! Whether you're new or have been with us from the beginning, we'd love to see you there.

Can't make it? The recording will be available on the blog afterwards.
